metadata.description: Agent Skills for Flare blockchain development

plugins.name: flare-ftso
plugins.description: FTSO domain knowledge for Flare development. Covers decentralized block-latency price feeds, Scaling anchor feeds, feed IDs, FtsoV2Interface, FeeCalculator, onchain and offchain consumption, and delegation.

plugins.name: flare-fassets
plugins.description: FAssets domain knowledge for Flare development. Covers wrapped tokens (FXRP, FBTC, FDOGE), minting, redemption, agents, collateral, and smart contract integration.

plugins.name: flare-fdc
plugins.description: Flare Data Connector domain knowledge. Covers attestation types (EVMTransaction, Web2Json, Payment), request flow, Merkle proofs, verifier/DA Layer, and contract verification.

plugins.name: flare-smart-accounts
plugins.description: Smart Accounts domain knowledge for Flare development. Covers account abstraction for XRPL users to interact with Flare without owning FLR.
